reviewText: Good episode. Great twist that I didn't see coming. Now have all of this wonderful series.
Not up to the usual standards of the first four series but still provides some droll fun as a married Jonathan Creek solves another mystery.

Can't get enough of this show. Alan Davies is just one of those people that is likeable in everything he does. It's not the absolute best show of the series, but it is somewhere in the middle, which is very good. Expectations are always high in a single show purchase, still, you won't be disappointed.
I love this show, so the movie was even better.  I just wish they would make more.  If you like the series, you will not be disappointed with this movie!
